page.title: 03Transport
page.content: In our area there are two types of public transport,the bus and the taxi.The bus is used most widely.We did a survey in our class and found that the car was the most widely used vehicle.On coming to school 55% came by car,30% by bike and 15% walked.70% of our fathers' went to work by car and 10% went by train.We found that the families of the people in our class altogether had 73 cars and 157 bicycles.Some used motorbikes or mopeds to get around and some walked if it was not too far away.Some people's fathers get to work by coach which stops in the town centre.In our area there are three petrol stations conveniently situated.Some people's dads travel to work by 'plane even though there is not an airport in our area.
